message:
/ri updateglobal kamu adalah subtitle Expert. Bantu saya membuat subtitle indonesia film donghua 'Renegade Immortal'. Saya akan memberikan mu teks code .srt yang sudah ada subtitle indonesianya, pelajari subtitle tersebut dan ikuti gaya bahasanya.
berikut adalah urutan tahap kultivasi Renegade Immortal, gunakan istilah ini ketika saya menyuruh kamu menerjemahkan subtitlenya nanti: 
- Dou Zhi Qi (斗之气)
- Dou Zhe (斗者)
- Dou Shi (斗师)
- Da Dou Shi (大斗师)
- Dou Ling (斗灵)
- Dou Wang (斗王)
- Dou Huang (斗皇)
- Dou Zong (斗宗)
- Dou Zun (斗尊)
- Dou Sheng (斗圣)
- Dou Di (斗帝)
Detail yang perlu diperhatikan:
- jika ada penyebutan benda atau jurus/teknik maka terjemahkan ke dalam bahasa inggris, dan gunakan juga tanda baca seperti koma dan titik.
- tiap tahap kultivasi memiliki 9 tingkatan untuk naik ke tahap berikutnya yaitu bintang 1-9.
- penyebutan nama klan terjemahkan dalam bentuk pinyin.

/btth berikut adalah file subtitle btth episode 119, pelajari gaya bahasa berikut: 
1
00:00:11,500 --> 00:00:12,500
叶家 -> Keluarga Ye,

2
00:00:12,500 --> 00:00:14,250
考核第五名 -> peringkat kelima dalam Ujian.

3
00:00:14,750 --> 00:00:16,000
再有一次 -> jika terjadi sekali lagi,

4
00:00:16,000 --> 00:00:18,500
便逐出丹域五大家族 -> akan diusir dari lima keluarga besar Wilayah Pil.

6
00:00:22,500 --> 00:00:23,250
叶长老 -> Tetua Ye.

7
00:00:23,750 --> 00:00:24,500
就是这里了吗 -> ini tempatnya?

8
00:00:25,000 --> 00:00:25,500
哦 -> oh.

9
00:00:26,000 --> 00:00:28,750
这里便是五大家族考核的地方 -> ini tempat Ujian lima keluarga besar.

10
00:00:29,250 --> 00:00:30,250
萧炎先生 -> Tuan Xiao Yan.

11
00:00:30,750 --> 00:00:34,250
只要您能在此次考核中排到前三名 -> asal Anda bisa menempati peringkat tiga besar dalam Ujian kali ini,

12
00:00:34,250 --> 00:00:38,000
我叶家往后愿以萧炎先生马首是瞻 -> Keluarga Ye bersedia mengabdi pada Tuan Xiao Yan.

13
00:00:38,000 --> 00:00:38,500
叶长老 -> Tetua Ye,

14
00:00:39,500 --> 00:00:40,750
我萧炎既已答应 -> karena Aku sudah menyetujuinya,

15
00:00:40,750 --> 00:00:41,750
便自会全力以赴 -> Aku akan berusaha yang terbaik.

16
00:00:45,000 --> 00:00:45,500
走吧 -> ayo.

17
00:00:52,250 --> 00:00:53,750
叶家到 -> Keluarga Ye telah tiba.

18
00:00:57,750 --> 00:01:00,250
上方便是丹曹白邱 -> diatas sana adalah Dan, Cao, Bai dan Qiu,

19
00:01:00,250 --> 00:01:02,250
四大家族的席位 -> tempat duduk empat keluarga besar.

20
00:01:02,500 --> 00:01:03,750
丹家丹轩 -> Dan Xuan dari keluarga Dan.

21
00:01:04,000 --> 00:01:07,000
丹家这次考核应该是由他出手 -> seharusnya Dia yang mewakili Keluarga Dan ikut Ujian kali ini.

22
00:01:07,750 --> 00:01:10,000
他的炼丹天赋在整个丹家 -> bakatnya dalam membuat Pil,

23
00:01:10,000 --> 00:01:12,000
也是数一数二的存在 -> juga termasuk paling baik di seluruh Keluarga Dan.

24
00:01:14,250 --> 00:01:15,500
原来是她 -> ternyata Dia.

25
00:01:15,750 --> 00:01:17,250
好奇特的体质 -> fisik yang sangat unik.

26
00:01:20,000 --> 00:01:21,500
白家白鹰 -> Bai Ying dari Keluarga Bai.

27
00:01:22,250 --> 00:01:25,000
如今白家最出色的年轻一辈 -> Dia adalah generasi muda paling berprestasi di Keluarga Bai saat ini.

28
00:01:25,750 --> 00:01:28,000
白家与叶家积怨已久 -> Keluarga Bai dan Ye sudah lama bermusuhan.

29
00:01:28,000 --> 00:01:31,500
他们绝不会给我叶家任何翻身的机会 -> Mereka tidak akan memeberikan Keluarga Ye kesempatan untuk bangkit kembali.

30
00:01:35,000 --> 00:01:38,000
而邱家派出的则叫邱机 -> sedangkan Keluarga Qiu, mengirim Qiu Ji.

31
00:01:38,500 --> 00:01:42,000
虽名声不响但同样不可小觑 -> meski tidak terkenal, tapi tetap tidak boleh dianggap remeh.

32
00:01:45,000 --> 00:01:46,500
至于曹家 -> kalau keluarga Cao...

33
00:01:46,500 --> 00:01:48,000
曹家到 -> Keluarga Cao sudah tiba.

34
00:02:01,750 --> 00:02:04,000
曹家三大天才 -> tiga Jenius dari Keluarga Cao,

35
00:02:04,000 --> 00:02:06,000
为首的便是曹颖 -> yang memimpin adalah Cao Ying.

36
00:02:06,500 --> 00:02:08,750
不过她应该不屑出手 -> tapi seharusnya dia tidak mau bertindak.

37
00:02:08,750 --> 00:02:10,250
曹单败于你手 -> Cao Dan penah dikalahkan olehmu.

38
00:02:10,500 --> 00:02:13,750
那如今能出手便只是曹休了 -> sekarang yang bisa maju hanya tinggal Cao Xiu.

39
00:02:13,750 --> 00:02:15,000
就是那个小子 -> itu bocahnya.

40
00:02:15,750 --> 00:02:17,750
破坏了我曹家和叶家的联姻 -> Dia merusak pernikahan antara Keluarga Cao dan Ye.

41
00:02:17,750 --> 00:02:20,500
没想到他居然是七品中级炼药师 -> tidak kusangka ternyata dia adalah Alkemis Kelas 7

42
00:02:35,250 --> 00:02:36,750
你便是那个萧炎 -> Kau adalah Xiao Yan?

43
00:02:37,250 --> 00:02:39,000
我听曹单说过你 -> Aku pernah mendengar Cao Dan membicarakanmu.

44
00:02:40,250 --> 00:02:41,750
你水平不错 -> Kau lumayan hebat.

45
00:02:41,750 --> 00:02:44,000
希望你不要因为一些行为 -> semoga kamu tidak menjerumuskan dirimu dalam masalah,

46
00:02:44,000 --> 00:02:46,000
把自己给扯入泥潭中 -> karena beberapa tindakanmu.

47
00:02:47,250 --> 00:02:48,000
多谢忠告 -> terima kasih atas peringatannya.

48
00:02:54,750 --> 00:02:56,250
既然人已到齐 -> karena semua orang sudah berkumpul,

49
00:02:56,250 --> 00:02:58,250
那考核便开始吧 -> maka ujian bisa akan dimulai.

50
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:01,500
有请五大家族代表进场 -> silahkan perwakilan dari lima Keluarga Besar memasuki Arena.

51
00:03:03,500 --> 00:03:04,500
萧炎大哥 -> Kak Xiao Yan.

52
00:03:04,750 --> 00:03:05,500
加油 -> semangat.

53
00:03:06,250 --> 00:03:07,000
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

54
00:03:07,500 --> 00:03:10,000
叶家就靠你了 -> Keluarga Ye bergantung padamu.

55
00:03:11,500 --> 00:03:13,000
见过盛长老 -> Hormat pada Tetua Sheng.

56
00:03:18,000 --> 00:03:20,250
我们的考核分为三项 -> Ujian kami terbagi menjadi tiga tahap.

57
00:03:20,750 --> 00:03:23,000
而这第一项便是测魂 -> tahap pertama adalah Ujian Jiwa.

58
00:03:27,250 --> 00:03:28,500
这是测魂石 -> ini adalah Batu Penguji Jiwa.

59
00:03:29,000 --> 00:03:32,000
你们依次将灵魂力量输入其内 -> Kalian memasukkan kekuatan jiwa kedalam secara bergiliran.

60
00:03:32,250 --> 00:03:36,250
测验出灵魂值达到四阶以上便是及格 -> jika nilai jiwa mencapai tingkat empat atau lebih, dianggap lulus.

61
00:03:37,250 --> 00:03:41,750
而这些年考核的最高纪录便是曹颖 -> Rekor tertinggi dalam U0jian beberapa tahun ini adalah Cao Ying.

62
00:03:42,250 --> 00:03:45,250
她当年魂值达到了九阶 -> nilai jiwanya mencapai tingkat sembilan waktu itu.

63
00:03:45,250 --> 00:03:47,000
至今未有人突破 -> belum ada yang berhasil menerobosnya..

64
00:03:48,250 --> 00:03:50,000
不知你们几人 -> Aku ingin tahu bagaimana,

66
00:03:50,000 --> 00:03:51,500
能表现如何啊 -> kalian semua akan tampil.

67
00:03:52,000 --> 00:03:52,750
我先来 -> Aku duluan.

68
00:04:08,500 --> 00:04:09,500
七阶 -> Tingkat 7?!

69
00:04:09,500 --> 00:04:10,750
少爷果然厉害 -> Tuan Muda memang hebat.

70
00:04:23,250 --> 00:04:24,250
八阶 -> Tingkat 8?!

71
00:04:24,250 --> 00:04:25,750
比邱机还高一阶 -> lebih tinggi satu tingkat dari Qiu Ji.

72
00:04:25,750 --> 00:04:27,250
不愧是我自家少主 -> Tuan Muda Keluarga Bai memang hebat.

73
00:04:37,750 --> 00:04:39,000
是八阶中段 -> Tingkat 8 menengah.

74
00:04:39,500 --> 00:04:40,750
真不愧是大哥 -> Kakak memang hebat.

75
00:04:59,250 --> 00:05:00,000
九阶 -> Tingkat 9?!

42
00:02:35,250 --> 00:02:36,750
你便是那个萧炎 -> Kau adalah Xiao Yan?

43
00:02:37,250 --> 00:02:39,000
我听曹单说过你 -> Aku pernah mendengar Cao Dan membicarakanmu.

44
00:02:40,250 --> 00:02:41,750
你水平不错 -> Kau lumayan hebat.

45
00:02:41,750 --> 00:02:44,000
希望你不要因为一些行为 -> semoga kamu tidak menjerumuskan dirimu dalam masalah,

46
00:02:44,000 --> 00:02:46,000
把自己给扯入泥潭中 -> karena beberapa tindakanmu.

47
00:02:47,250 --> 00:02:48,000
多谢忠告 -> terima kasih atas peringatannya.

48
00:02:54,750 --> 00:02:56,250
既然人已到齐 -> karena semua orang sudah berkumpul,

49
00:02:56,250 --> 00:02:58,250
那考核便开始吧 -> maka ujian bisa akan dimulai.

50
00:02:59,000 --> 00:03:01,500
有请五大家族代表进场 -> silahkan perwakilan dari lima Keluarga Besar memasuki Arena.

51
00:03:03,500 --> 00:03:04,500
萧炎大哥 -> Kak Xiao Yan.

52
00:03:04,750 --> 00:03:05,500
加油 -> semangat.

53
00:03:06,250 --> 00:03:07,000
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

54
00:03:07,500 --> 00:03:10,000
叶家就靠你了 -> Keluarga Ye bergantung padamu.

55
00:03:11,500 --> 00:03:13,000
见过盛长老 -> Hormat pada Tetua Sheng.

56
00:03:18,000 --> 00:03:20,250
我们的考核分为三项 -> Ujian kami terbagi menjadi tiga tahap.

57
00:03:20,750 --> 00:03:23,000
而这第一项便是测魂 -> tahap pertama adalah Ujian Jiwa.

58
00:03:27,250 --> 00:03:28,500
这是测魂石 -> ini adalah Batu Penguji Jiwa.

59
00:03:29,000 --> 00:03:32,000
你们依次将灵魂力量输入其内 -> Kalian memasukkan kekuatan jiwa kedalam secara bergiliran.

60
00:03:32,250 --> 00:03:36,250
测验出灵魂值达到四阶以上便是及格 -> jika nilai jiwa mencapai tingkat empat atau lebih, dianggap lulus.

61
00:03:37,250 --> 00:03:41,750
而这些年考核的最高纪录便是曹颖 -> Rekor tertinggi dalam U0jian beberapa tahun ini adalah Cao Ying.

62
00:03:42,250 --> 00:03:45,250
她当年魂值达到了九阶 -> nilai jiwanya mencapai tingkat sembilan waktu itu.

63
00:03:45,250 --> 00:03:47,000
至今未有人突破 -> belum ada yang berhasil menerobosnya..

64
00:03:48,250 --> 00:03:50,000
不知你们几人 -> Aku ingin tahu bagaimana,

66
00:03:50,000 --> 00:03:51,500
能表现如何啊 -> kalian semua akan tampil.

67
00:03:52,000 --> 00:03:52,750
我先来 -> Aku duluan.

68
00:04:08,500 --> 00:04:09,500
七阶 -> Tingkat 7?!

69
00:04:09,500 --> 00:04:10,750
少爷果然厉害 -> Tuan Muda memang hebat.

70
00:04:23,250 --> 00:04:24,250
八阶 -> Tingkat 8?!

71
00:04:24,250 --> 00:04:25,750
比邱机还高一阶 -> lebih tinggi satu tingkat dari Qiu Ji.

72
00:04:25,750 --> 00:04:27,250
不愧是我自家少主 -> Tuan Muda Keluarga Bai memang hebat.

73
00:04:37,750 --> 00:04:39,000
是八阶中段 -> Tingkat 8 menengah.

74
00:04:39,500 --> 00:04:40,750
真不愧是大哥 -> Kakak memang hebat.

75
00:04:59,250 --> 00:05:00,000
九阶 -> Tingkat 9?!

76
00:05:00,000 --> 00:05:02,000
不愧是丹家下一任的掌舵人 -> Dia layak menjadi Pemimpin Keluarga Dan berikutnya.

77
00:05:02,000 --> 00:05:03,750
绝非常人能比阿 -> tidak bisa dibandingkan orang biasa.

78
00:05:03,750 --> 00:05:04,500
是啊 -> benar.

79
00:05:04,500 --> 00:05:05,750
在同辈中 -> diantara sesama generasi,

80
00:05:05,750 --> 00:05:08,250
这丹轩算是相当不错了 -> Dan Xuan termasuk lumayan hebat.

81
00:05:18,750 --> 00:05:21,250
看你叶家如何翻盘 -> kulihat bagaimana Keluarga Ye membalikkan situasi.

82
00:05:29,250 --> 00:05:31,000
测灵魂之力 -> menguji kekuatan Jiwa?

83
00:05:37,000 --> 00:05:37,750
这是 -> ini...

84
00:06:15,000 --> 00:06:15,750
抱歉 -> Maaf,

85
00:06:16,250 --> 00:06:16,750
这 -> ini...

86
00:06:17,000 --> 00:06:18,250
不需要赔吧 -> tidak perlu ganti rugi, kan?

87
00:06:21,750 --> 00:06:23,750
不需要不需要 -> tidak perlu,

88
00:06:23,750 --> 00:06:25,500
这点经费还是有的 -> kami punya Anggaran untuk hal ini.

89
00:06:26,750 --> 00:06:28,500
测试石虽爆 -> meskipun batu Ujian hancur,

90
00:06:28,500 --> 00:06:30,500
但按老夫的感知来说 -> tapi menurut persepsiku,

91
00:06:30,750 --> 00:06:34,000
你的灵魂力量约在十四阶左右 -> kekuatan jiwamu sekitar tingkat 14.

92
00:06:34,000 --> 00:06:37,250
已打破了曹颖当年留下的记录 -> telah memecahkan rekor dari Cao Ying waktu itu.

93
00:06:37,500 --> 00:06:38,500
十四阶 -> Tingkat 14?!

94
00:06:38,500 --> 00:06:40,000
这 这怎么可能 -> mana mungkin?

95
00:06:40,000 --> 00:06:41,000
好厉害 -> hebat sekali.

96
00:06:41,500 --> 00:06:42,000
不可能 -> tidak mungkin.

97
00:06:42,000 --> 00:06:43,000
这绝对不可能 -> ini tidak mungkin.

98
00:06:43,500 --> 00:06:44,250
盛长老 -> Tetua Sheng.

99
00:06:44,500 --> 00:06:46,000
您老人家不会判断错误吧 -> Anda tidak salah menilai, kan?

100
00:06:47,000 --> 00:06:50,000
你是在质疑我高阶炼药师的灵魂感知吗 -> apakah Kau meragukan persepsi jiwa dari Alkemis tingkat tinggi?

101
00:06:55,000 --> 00:06:56,000
我宣布 -> kuumumkan,

102
00:06:56,500 --> 00:06:59,500
灵魂强度测试到此结束 -> Ujian kekuatan jiwa berakhir disini.

103
00:07:00,000 --> 00:07:02,000
第一名萧炎 -> peringkat pertama, Xiao Yan.

104
00:07:02,750 --> 00:07:04,250
爷爷你看 -> Kakek, lihatlah.

105
00:07:04,500 --> 00:07:06,250
叶家有救了 -> Keluarga Ye tertolong.

106
00:07:06,250 --> 00:07:07,750
看来这次 -> sepertinya kali ini,

107
00:07:07,750 --> 00:07:10,000
来了个不得了的家伙 -> datang bocah yang hebat.

108
00:07:17,500 --> 00:07:21,250
接下来的第二项考核灵魂操控 -> Ujian tahap kedua adalah pengendalian jiwa.

109
00:07:21,750 --> 00:07:25,000
上方是由魂钢制成的测魂珠 -> diatas sana ada manik penguji jiwa yang terbuat dari baja jiwa.

110
00:07:25,000 --> 00:07:29,250
用灵魂操控此珠宛如承载千斤之物 -> mengontrol manik ini dengan jiwa, seperti membawa benda seribu Kilogram.

111
00:07:29,750 --> 00:07:33,250
你们谁用灵魂之力接下的测魂珠最多 -> siapa yang menangkap manik penguji jiwa paling banyak dengan kekuatan jiwa,

112
00:07:33,250 --> 00:07:36,000
便是此项考核的优胜者 -> dia adalah pemenang dalam Ujian ini.

113
00:07:36,500 --> 00:07:38,750
名次以此类推 -> peringkatnya berurut seperti ini.

114
00:07:39,000 --> 00:07:42,750
这项记录当年也是由曹颖所创 -> rekor ini juga dicetak oleh Cao Ying waktu itu.

115
00:07:43,000 --> 00:07:45,750
她一次性接下了八十九颗 -> dia sekaligus menangkap 89 manik.

116
00:07:46,500 --> 00:07:50,000
接下来看你们能接多少了 -> selanjutnya, lihat kalian  dapat menangkap berapa banyak.

117
00:08:02,750 --> 00:08:03,500
不行 -> tidak bisa,

118
00:08:03,500 --> 00:08:04,750
坚持不住了 -> tidak bisa bertahan lagi.

119
00:08:07,250 --> 00:08:08,250
邱机 -> Qiu Ji,

120
00:08:08,250 --> 00:08:09,750
四十一颗 -> 41 butir.

121
00:08:10,000 --> 00:08:11,000
白鹰 -> Bai Ying,

122
00:08:11,000 --> 00:08:12,250
四十三颗 -> 43 Butir.

123
00:08:23,500 --> 00:08:24,500
曹休 -> Cao Xiu,

124
00:08:24,500 --> 00:08:25,750
五十六颗 -> 56 butir.

125
00:08:26,000 --> 00:08:27,000
丹轩 -> Dan Xuan,

126
00:08:27,000 --> 00:08:28,250
六十六颗 46 butir.

127
00:08:28,500 --> 00:08:29,250
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

128
00:08:29,500 --> 00:08:31,750
再不动手珠子就没了啊 -> kalau masih tidak beraksi, maniknya akan habis.

129
00:08:47,500 --> 00:08:49,750
这些应该够了吧 -> ini seharusnya sudah cukup, kan?

130
00:08:49,750 --> 00:08:50,250
九 -> sembilan...

131
00:08:50,250 --> 00:08:51,250
九十三颗 -> 93 butir.

132
00:08:51,500 --> 00:08:52,500
这么随意 -> begitu santai?!

133
00:08:55,250 --> 00:08:56,750
有这么玩的吗 -> ini seperti sedang bermain-main.

134
00:08:56,750 --> 00:08:57,750
有意思啊 -> menarik.

135
00:08:59,000 --> 00:09:00,500
那天果然没错 -> hari itu memang tidak salah.

136
00:09:02,000 --> 00:09:03,000
非常强 -> Dia sangat kuat.

137
00:09:05,250 --> 00:09:06,250
承让了 -> terima kasih telah memberi kesempatan.

138
00:09:09,000 --> 00:09:10,000
萧炎大哥好棒 -> Kak Xiao Yan hebat sekali.

139
00:09:10,000 --> 00:09:11,000
好手段 -> luar biasa.

140
00:09:18,250 --> 00:09:19,500
混蛋 -> Bajingan.

141
00:09:19,750 --> 00:09:21,750
风头都让他给抢走了 -> Dia menjadi pusat perhatian.

142
00:09:22,000 --> 00:09:24,750
我宣布第二项测试 -> kuumumkan, dalam ujian tahap kedua,

143
00:09:24,750 --> 00:09:28,750
萧炎以九十三颗的成绩依旧保持第一 -> Xiao Yan tetap menempati peringkat pertama dengan skor 93,

144
00:09:29,000 --> 00:09:32,500
并打破了曹颖当年创下的记录 -> dan memecahkan rekor yang diciptakan oleh Cao Ying waktu itu.

145
00:09:34,750 --> 00:09:36,750
最后一项测试 -> Ujian terakhir.

146
00:09:36,750 --> 00:09:39,250
灵魂力量的攻击性 -> keterampilan serangan kekuatan jiwa.

147
00:09:39,250 --> 00:09:40,250
盛长老 -> Tetua Sheng.

148
00:09:42,250 --> 00:09:43,500
按照规矩 -> sesuai aturan,

149
00:09:43,500 --> 00:09:47,250
上一届冠军所属家族有一次换人的资格 -> Keluarga dari juara sebelumnya memiliki satu kesempatan untuk mengganti anggota.

150
00:09:48,000 --> 00:09:50,000
曹家想要中途换人 -> Keluarga Cao ingin mengganti orang di pertengahan.

151
00:09:50,000 --> 00:09:51,250
不知可否 -> bolehkah?

152
00:09:55,000 --> 00:09:56,000
请放心 -> tenang saja,

153
00:09:56,250 --> 00:09:57,250
我不会胡来 -> Aku tidak akan bertindak sembarangan.

154
00:09:57,750 --> 00:09:59,250
只是手痒了 -> hanya saja, tanganku gatal.

155
00:09:59,250 --> 00:10:01,750
想找萧炎先生试试 -> Aku ingin bertanding dengan Tuan Xiao Yan.

156
00:10:07,500 --> 00:10:09,250
既然曹颖小姐都这般说了 -> karena Nona Cao Ying sudah berkata begitu,

157
00:10:09,750 --> 00:10:10,750
那萧炎 -> maka Aku,

158
00:10:11,000 --> 00:10:12,000
愿意奉陪 -> bersedia menenami.

159
00:10:14,750 --> 00:10:16,000
风度不错哟 -> sikap yang bagus.

160
00:10:21,000 --> 00:10:22,250
曹休大哥 -> Kak Cao Xiu.

161
00:10:22,250 --> 00:10:23,250
让我来吧 -> biar Aku saja.

162
00:10:28,000 --> 00:10:30,000
既然都没问题了 -> karena semuanya tidak keberatan,

163
00:10:30,000 --> 00:10:32,000
那么考核便开始吧 -> maka Ujian bisa dimulai!

164
00:10:49,750 --> 00:10:50,500
这 -> ini...

165
00:10:50,500 --> 00:10:51,500
这怎么打 -> bagaimana bertanding seperti ini?

166
00:10:52,250 --> 00:10:53,250
退出吧 -> munduk saja.

167
00:10:59,000 --> 00:10:59,750
好了 -> baiklah.

168
00:11:00,250 --> 00:11:02,750
现在已只有你我二人 -> sekarang sisa kita berdua.

169
00:11:03,000 --> 00:11:05,250
便不用再有所顾虑了 -> tidak perlu peduli hal lain lagi.

170
00:11:05,750 --> 00:11:06,750
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

171
00:11:07,000 --> 00:11:10,250
只要你接下来能接我三记灵魂掌印 -> asal selanjutnya kau bisa menerima tiga segel tapak jiwaku,

172
00:11:10,250 --> 00:11:11,750
那我便退出 -> aku akan mundur.

173
00:11:12,500 --> 00:11:13,250
当然 -> tentu saja.

174
00:11:13,500 --> 00:11:15,750
即便此刻你退出的话 -> biarpun kau mundur sekarang,

175
00:11:15,750 --> 00:11:18,250
那也能够保证第二名的名次 -> juga bisa menduduki peringkat kedua.

176
00:11:18,250 --> 00:11:20,750
叶家也算得救 -> Keluarga Ye termasuk selamat.

177
00:11:22,250 --> 00:11:23,750
所以你是接 -> jadi, kau mau menerimanya...

178
00:11:24,250 --> 00:11:25,750
还是自己离开 -> atau pergi sendiri?

179
00:11:30,500 --> 00:11:31,500
曹颖小姐 -> Nona Cao Ying.

180
00:11:32,000 --> 00:11:32,500
请 -> silahkan.

181
00:11:34,500 --> 00:11:37,250
萧炎先生果然气度非凡 -> Tuan Xiao Yan ternyata memang tidak biasa.

182
00:11:37,500 --> 00:11:39,250
既然如此的话 -> Jika begitu,

183
00:11:39,250 --> 00:11:40,500
那小女子 -> maka saya, seorang wanita kecil,

184
00:11:40,500 --> 00:11:41,750
可就献丑了 -> akan menunjukkan kemampuanku.

185
00:11:43,750 --> 00:11:45,500
远古炼药师 -> Alkemis kuno,

186
00:11:45,500 --> 00:11:49,000
能够将灵魂力量的威力发挥至最大 -> dapat mengeluarkan kekuatan jiwa hingga tingkat tertinggi.

187
00:11:49,750 --> 00:11:53,000
这种手段被称之为魂技 -> metode ini disebut keterampilan jiwa.

188
00:11:53,750 --> 00:11:55,750
我受过类似传承 -> Aku menerima warisan seperti ini.

189
00:11:55,750 --> 00:11:57,000
你可要小心哦 -> Kau harus berhati-hati.

190
00:11:58,750 --> 00:11:59,750
原来魂技 -> ternyata keterampilan jiwa.

191
00:11:59,750 --> 00:12:02,000
还分为攻击和修炼两种类别 -> terbagi menjadi dua kategori, serangan dan pelatihan.

192
00:12:02,250 --> 00:12:03,250
好东西啊 -> benda yang bagus.

193
00:12:10,000 --> 00:12:10,500
破 -> Hancur!

194
00:12:17,000 --> 00:12:17,750
再来 -> lagi.

195
00:12:18,500 --> 00:12:22,750
这萧炎竟能与曹颖这种妖女硬碰而不落下风 -> Xiao Yan sebenarnya bisa melawan Cao Ying tanpa kalah?

196
00:12:22,750 --> 00:12:23,500
这一掌 -> Tapak ini, 

197
00:12:23,500 --> 00:12:26,500
即便是一些七品高级的炼药师也接不下 -> bahkan tidak bisa diterima oleh alkemis kelas 7.

198
00:12:26,500 --> 00:12:27,500
是啊 -> benar.

199
00:12:28,000 --> 00:12:30,000
这萧炎果然不简单 -> Xiao Yan ternayata memang tidak sederhana.

200
00:12:30,750 --> 00:12:33,000
说不定会如同丹晨一般 -> mungkin seperti Dan Chen,

201
00:12:33,000 --> 00:12:34,500
是我的劲敌 -> merupakan saingan beratku.

202
00:13:24,750 --> 00:13:25,500
再来 -> lagi.

203
00:14:01,250 --> 00:14:02,500
怎么可能 -> bagaimana mungkin? 

204
00:14:02,750 --> 00:14:05,250
他竟然看了几眼就学会了我的魂技 -> Dia bisa mempelajari keterampilan jiwaku, hanya dengan melihat beberapa kali?

205
00:14:56,000 --> 00:14:58,250
这下经费可不够了 -> kali ini, anggarannya sudah tidak cukup.

206
00:15:00,500 --> 00:15:02,000
三掌已到 -> sudah tiga tapak.

207
00:15:02,000 --> 00:15:02,750
你赢了 -> kau menang.

208
00:15:04,500 --> 00:15:05,500
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

209
00:15:05,500 --> 00:15:06,750
丹会上 -> saat konferensi Pil,

210
00:15:06,750 --> 00:15:08,250
一定要全力以赴哦 -> kamu harus memberikan usaha terbaikmu.

211
00:15:11,250 --> 00:15:12,750
我宣布 -> kuumumkan,

212
00:15:12,750 --> 00:15:15,000
此次五大家族考核 -> Ujian lima keluarga besar kali ini,

213
00:15:15,000 --> 00:15:17,750
第一名是代表叶家的萧炎 -> peringkat pertama adalah Xiao Yan yang mewakili Keluarga Ye,

214
00:15:18,000 --> 00:15:22,000
而叶家也成功通过此次考核 -> dan Keluarga Ye juga berhasil lolos dari ujian kali ini.

215
00:15:22,000 --> 00:15:22,750
恭喜 -> selamat.

216
00:15:46,250 --> 00:15:47,750
魂手印 -> Segel Tapak Jiwa.

217
00:15:48,250 --> 00:15:50,750
丹塔居然有如此强大的魂技传承 -> Pagoda Pil sebenarnya memiliki warisan keterampilan Jiwa sekuat itu.

218
00:15:52,000 --> 00:15:53,500
真是不虚此行 -> tidak sia-sia aku datang kemari.

219
00:16:08,500 --> 00:16:09,500
灵魂障壁 -> penghalang Jiwa?

00:00:19,700\n为何死意弥漫 -> mengapa malah dipenuhi aura kematian ?\n\n4\n00:00:27,450 --> 00:00:28,200\n一年间 -> dalam setahun ini,\n\n5\n00:00:29,200 --> 00:00:31,450\n我踏过了雪域国许多城池 -> Aku telah melewati 00:00:54,700\n多谢仙长 -> Terima Kasih Tuan.\n\n15\n00:00:55,450 --> 00:00:57,200\n凡人毫无生机活力 -> orang biasa tidak memiliki semangat hidup.\n\n16\n00:00:58,450 --> 00:01:01,200\n此地死意也尤为深重 -> tempat ini dipenuhi aura kematian yang sangat kental.\n\n17\n00:01:02,450 --> 00:01:03,950\n我虽不喜此地 -> meski aku tidak suka tempat ini,\n\n18\n00:01:04,700 --> 00:01:06,450\n但却是我体会生死意境中 -> tapi ini tempat yang cocok untuk merasakan konsepsi Hidup dan Mati-ku.\n\n19\n00:01:06,450 --> 00:01:07,700\n死意的好地方 -> tempat yang cocok untuk memahami arti kematian.\n\n20\n00:01:09,200 --> 00:01:12,450\n雪域国制作的冰雕的确颇为神奇 -> Patung es yang dibuat di Negara Domain Salju memang ajaib.\n\n21\n00:01:13,700 --> 00:01:15,450\n凡人所雕刻的冰雕 -> sedangkan patung es yang diukir oleh orang biasa,\n\n22\n00:01:15,700 --> 00:01:18,450\n会有专门的修士为其刻下阵法 -> akan diberi formasi khusus oleh kultivator tertentu.\n\n23\n00:01:19,700 --> 00:01:21,200\n并以一种秘法激活 -> lalu diaktifkan dengan metode rahasia.\n\n24\n00:01:22,450 --> 00:01:25,950\n使得这冰雕变成如同傀儡般的存在 -> membuat patung es ini menjadi seperti boneka hidup.\n\n25\n00:01:26,450 --> 00:01:28,450\n雪域修士的功法精髓 -> esensi keterampilan dari kultivator Domain 00:01:34,700\n我猜测 -> Aku menduga,\n\n29\n00:01:35,200 --> 00:01:37,450\n这冰雕就是雪域国的根本 -> Patung Es ini adalah pondasi Negara Domain Salju.\n\n30\n00:01:38,700 --> 00:01:39,950\n若能习得此法 -> jika bisa bagiku.\n\n33\n00:01:50,200 --> 00:01:52,200\n趁着我雪域防守空虚 -> memanfaatkan saat pertahanan Negara Domain Salju lemah,\n\n34\n00:01:52,450 --> 00:01:55,700\n逃往境外的四派余孽最近越加活跃 -> sisa-sisa empat Faksi yang melarikan diri keluar wilayah semakin aktif bertindak.\n\n35\n00:01:56,950 --> 00:01:58,700\n就算大长老们不在 -> meski para Tetua Agung tidak ada,\n\n36\n00:01:59,200 --> 00:02:02,700\n这群丧家犬也掀不起什么风浪 -> gerombolan anjing tanpa tuan ini takkan menimbulkan ancaman besar.\n\n37\n00:02:03,450 --> 00:02:05,450\n先把内围的剿灭干净 -> Pertama, bersihkan lingkungan bagian dalam,\n\n38\n00:02:05,950 --> \n\n62\n00:03:20,950 --> 00:03:23,950\n这雪域新国以城主分支 -> Negara Domain Salju memiliki cabang-cabang penguasa.\n\n63\n00:03:25,700 --> 00:03:29,700\n那这城主修为必然是有强有弱 -> para penguasa kota ini pasti memiliki 00:02:25,000\n在这等着\n\n20\n00:02:25,500 --> 00:02:27,000\n我去一趟古神之地\n\n21\n00:02:38,000 --> 00:02:40,000\n只要我不进入古神之地关卡内\n\n22\n00:02:40,250 --> 00:02:42,000\n拓森应该就不会察觉\n\n23\n00:02:42,750 --> 00:02:43,750\n即便察觉\n\n24\n00:02:44,500 --> 00:02:46,000\n以我现在的修为\n\n25\n00:02:46,750 --> 00:02:48,500\n也定然可以提前离开\n\n26\n00:02:53,250 --> 00:02:55,000\n上次我在修魔海炼制禁幡\n\n27\n00:02:55,500 --> 00:02:57,500\n却引动天劫遭到重创\n\n28\n00:02:58,000 --> 00:02:59,250\n此处是古神体内\n\n29\n00:02:59,750 --> 00:03:00,750\n自成一界\n\n30\n00:03:01,250 --> 00:03:02,750\n天劫应该无法降临\n\n31\n00:03:16,500 --> 00:03:17,500\n最后一个\n\n32\n00:03:22,000 --> 00:03:23,250\n若我猜测有误\n\n33\n00:03:23,750 --> 00:03:25,000\n天劫降临\n\n34\n00:03:25,500 --> 00:03:27,750\n唯一的禁幡怕是很难保住\n\n35\n00:03:28,250 --> 00:03:29,500\n可若现在停下\n\n36\n00:03:30,250 --> 00:03:31,500\n禁幡达不到小成\n\n37\n00:03:31,750 --> 00:03:32,500\n威力不够\n\n38\n00:03:33,250 --> 00:03:35,000\n仙界之行也起不到作用\n\n39\n00:03:39,750 --> 00:03:40,500\n赌一把\n\n40\n00:04:13,750 --> 00:04:14,750\n二赌赢了\n\n41\n00:04:16,750 --> 00:04:19,250\n既然这古神之地无需顾虑天劫\n\n42\n00:04:19,750 --> 00:04:21,250\n不如继续叠加禁制\n\n43\n00:04:22,000 --> 00:04:24,750\n兴许禁幡能一举达到中成\n\n44\n00:04:25,250 --> 00:04:26,250\n届时\n\n45\n00:04:26,500 --> 00:04:28,000\n必定威力倍增\n\n46\n00:04:48,000 --> 00:04:48,750\n以我修为\n\n47\n00:04:49,250 --> 00:04:51,500\n这禁幡离中成还是差了一步\n\n48\n00:04:52,500 --> 00:04:53,500\n也罢\n\n49\n00:04:53,750 --> 00:04:56,250\n此后禁幡中成时引发的天劫\n\n50\n00:04:56,750 --> 00:04:59,500\n或可以成为我在生死关头的杀手锏\n\n51\n00:05:05,500 --> 00:05:08,500\n此法宝为混元驱兽圈\n\n52\n00:05:09,250 --> 00:05:12,500\n世间任何兽类都可被收服操控\n\n53\n00:05:13,250 --> 00:05:15,750\n只是使用此物会耗损灵力\n\n54\n00:05:16,000 --> 00:05:18,000\n收服的兽类越强大\n\n55\n00:05:18,250 --> 00:05:30,000\n若找不到\n\n60\n00:05:30,250 --> 00:05:31,500\n再离开也不迟\n\n61\n00:05:39,500 --> 00:05:41,000\n灵兽怎都不见了\n\n62\n00:05:44,000 --> 00:05:44,750\n荒兽\n\n63\n00:06:23,500 --> keluarga.\n\n122\n00:12:29,750 --> 00:12:31,000\nSangat menakutkan.\n\n123\n00:12:37,500 --> 00:12:38,750\nSekarang Bendera Terlarang,\n\n124\n00:12:39,000 --> 00:12:40,250\niblis,\n\n125\n00:12:40,750 --> 00:12:42,500\ndan alat ajaib kuno semuanya telah dipersiapkan.\n\n126\n00:12:43,250 --> 00:12:44,500\nBahkan tiga sarung pedang itu\n\n127\n00:12:45,250 --> 00:12:47,000\ntelah kupersembahkan dengan roh nasib.\n\n128\n00:12:48,000 --> 00:12:49,000\nSekarang,\n\n129\n00:12:50,000 --> 00:12:51,250\nhanya tinggal langkah terakhir.\n\n130\n00:13:03,750 --> 00:13:04,500\nBaiklah.\n\n131\n00:13:14,500 --> 00:13:15,500\nSelama bertahun-tahun ini,\n\n132\n00:13:16,000 --> 00:13:18,000\nTiga sarung pedang itu sudah mulai dipersembahkan berturut-turut.\n\n133\n00:13:19,250 --> 00:13:21,250\nBahkan alat sihir kuno dari zaman dahulu\n\n134\n00:13:21,750 --> 00:13:23,750\ntelah kubuka untuk digunakan.\n\n135\n00:13:24,500 --> 00:13:27,000\nTapi satu-satunya yang kudapatkan di Laut Setan ini,\n\n136\n00:13:27,500 --> 00:13:28,750\nAku selalu tidak bisa memahaminya.\n\n137\n00:13:49,250 --> 00:13:50,250\nHari ini,\n\n138\n00:13:50,250 --> 00:13:51,500\nakhirnya tiba.\n\n139\n00:14:08,750 --> 00:14:10,500\nAkhirnya terbuka!\n\n140\n00:14:11,000 --> 00:14:12,500\nNak,\n\n141\n00:14:12,500 --> 00:14:15,750\nkau harus menggunakan topi jerami yang kakek pinjamkan dengan baik.\n\n142\n00:14:16,000 --> 00:14:19,250\nKalau tidak, nyawamu mungkin tidak aman!\n\n143\n00:14:20,000 --> 00:14:21,000\nKakek,\n\n144\n00:14:21,000 --> 00:14:22,250\nlanjutkan ceritanya!\n\n145\n00:14:22,500 --> 00:14:23,500\nYa, kakek,\n\n146\n00:14:23,500 --> 00:14:24,250\nceritakan!\n\n147\n00:14:24,750 --> 00:14:25,500\nLanjutkan, lanjutkan!\n\n148\n00:14:27,000 --> 00:14:30,000\nDulu, terjadi kecelakaan\n\n149\n00:14:30,000 --> 00:14:32,500\nyang membuat semua dewa kuno meninggal.\n\n150\n00:14:33,000 --> 00:14:36,750\nAlam Abadi pun terpecah menjadi potongan-potongan.\n\n151\n00:14:37,000 --> 00:14:39,750\nNamun para kultivator tidak menyerah.\n\n152\n00:14:40,000 --> 00:14:43,000\nSetiap kali gerbang Alam Abadi terbuka kembali,\n\n153\n00:14:43,250 --> 00:14:46,750\nmereka masih berbondong-bondong mengejar perbendaharaan kuno.\n\n154\n00:14:47,000 --> 00:14:50,000\nUntuk menemukan sisa-sisa harta yang ada."}]}","headers":{"Accept":"application/json","Content-Type":"application/json","authorization":"Bearer 00:00:10,000\n真扫兴\n\n3\n00:00:11,000 --> 00:00:12,250\n知足吧\n\n4\n00:00:12,500 --> 00:00:15,000\n最近几大宗门四处搜刮宝贝\n\n5\n00:00:15,250 --> 00:00:17,000\n能剩下点就不错啦\n\n6\n00:00:19,250 --> 00:00:20,500\n四大宗门这是要\n\n7\n00:00:23,250 --> 00:00:24,250\n我听说\n\n8\n00:00:24,750 --> 00:00:26,250\n他们要去仙界\n\n9\n00:00:31,750 --> 00:00:32,750\n雪域国一战\n\n10\n00:00:33,250 --> 00:00:35,000\n我几乎将法宝用尽\n\n11\n00:00:35,750 --> 00:00:37,000\n此次仙界之行\n\n12\n00:00:37,250 --> 00:00:38,500\n各宗门虎视眈眈\n\n13\n00:00:39,250 --> 00:00:41,000\n我必须做好万全准备\n\n14\n00:00:42,000 --> 00:00:42,750\n第一步\n\n15\n00:00:43,500 --> 00:00:44,750\n就是重炼禁幡\n\n16\n00:01:07,750 --> 00:01:08,500\n这是\n\n17\n00:01:15,000 --> 00:01:16,000\n此物对你有用\n\n18\n00:01:59,000 --> 00:02:01,000\n竟能提高灵兽修为\n\n19\n00:02:24,000 --> 00:02:25,000\n在这等着\n\n20\n00:02:25,500 --> 00:02:27,000\n我去一趟古神之地\n\n21\n00:02:38,000 --> 00:02:40,000\n只要我不进入古神之地关卡内\n\n22\n00:02:40,250 --> 00:02:42,000\n拓森应该就不会察觉\n\n23\n00:02:42,750 --> 00:02:43,750\n即便察觉\n\n24\n00:02:44,500 --> 00:02:46,000\n以我现在的修为\n\n25\n00:02:46,750 --> 00:02:48,500\n也定然可以提前离开\n\n26\n00:02:53,250 --> 00:02:55,000\n上次我在修魔海炼制禁幡\n\n27\n00:02:55,500 --> 00:02:57,500\n却引动天劫遭到重创\n\n28\n00:02:58,000 --> 00:02:59,250\n此处是古神体内\n\n29\n00:02:59,750 --> 00:03:00,750\n自成一界\n\n30\n00:03:01,250 --> 00:03:02,750\n天劫应该无法降临\n\n31\n00:03:16,500 --> 00:03:17,500\n最后一个\n\n32\n00:03:22,000 --> 00:03:23,250\n若我猜测有误\n\n33\n00:03:23,750 --> 00:03:25,000\n天劫降临\n\n34\n00:03:25,500 --> 00:03:27,750\n唯一的禁幡怕是很难保住\n\n35\n00:03:28,250 --> 00:03:29,500\n可若现在停下\n\n36\n00:03:30,250 --> 00:03:31,500\n禁幡达不到小成\n\n37\n00:03:31,750 --> 00:03:32,500\n威力不够\n\n38\n00:03:33,250 --> 00:03:35,000\n仙界之行也起不到作用\n\n39\n00:03:39,750 --> 00:03:40,500\n赌一把\n\n40\n00:04:13,750 --> 00:04:14,750\n二赌赢了\n\n41\n00:04:16,750 --> 00:04:19,250\n既然这古神之地无需顾虑天劫\n\n42\n00:04:19,750 --> 00:04:21,250\n不如继续叠加禁制\n\n43\n00:04:22,000 --> 00:04:24,750\n兴许禁幡能一举达到中成\n\n44\n00:04:25,250 --> 00:04:26,250\n届时\n\n45\n00:04:26,500 --> 00:04:28,000\n必定威力倍增\n\n46\n00:04:48,000 --> 00:04:48,750\n以我修为\n\n47\n00:04:49,250 --> 00:04:51,500\n这禁幡离中成还是差了一步\n\n48\n00:04:52,500 --> 00:04:53,500\n也罢\n\n49\n00:04:53,750 --> 00:04:56,250\n此后禁幡中成时引发的天劫\n\n50\n00:04:56,750 --> 00:04:59,500\n或可以成为我在生死关头的杀手锏\n\n51\n00:05:05,500 --> 00:05:08,500\n此法宝为混元驱兽圈\n\n52\n00:05:09,250 --> 00:05:12,500\n世间任何兽类都可被收服操控\n\n53\n00:05:13,250 --> 00:05:15,750\n只是使用此物会耗损灵力\n\n54\n00:05:16,000 --> 00:05:18,000\n收服的兽类越强大\n\n55\n00:05:18,250 --> 00:05:19,750\n耗损灵力越高\n\n56\n00:05:20,250 --> 00:05:21,750\n需量力而行\n\n57\n00:05:24,000 --> 00:05:25,750\n若能再收服一只妖兽\n\n58\n00:05:26,250 --> 00:05:27,750\n也算意外之喜\n\n59\n00:05:29,000 --> 00:05:30,000\n若找不到\n\n60\n00:05:30,250 --> 00:05:31,500\n再离开也不迟\n\n61\n00:05:39,500 --> 00:05:41,000\n灵兽怎都不见了\n\n62\n00:05:44,000 --> 00:05:44,750\n荒兽\n\n63\n00:06:23,500 --> 00:06:25,500\n两只荒兽打架哎\n\n64\n00:06:25,500 --> 00:06:26,250\n不对\n\n65\n00:06:26,750 --> 00:06:28,000\n这蛙兽不是荒兽\n\n66\n00:06:28,500 --> 00:06:29,750\n只是上品灵兽\n\n67\n00:06:42,000 --> 00:06:43,500\n能与荒兽一较高下\n\n68\n00:06:44,000 --> 00:06:45,000\n真不简单\n\n69\n00:06:56,250 --> 00:06:57,500\n这蛟龙好厉害\n\n70\n00:06:58,000 --> 00:06:58,250\n主子\n\n71\n00:06:58,250 --> 00:06:59,000\n收了它\n\n72\n00:06:59,750 --> 00:07:01,250\n以我现在的修为\n\n73\n00:07:01,750 --> 00:07:03,250\n还无法收服荒兽\n\n74\n00:07:03,750 --> 00:07:05,500\n上品灵兽倒可一试\n\n75\n00:07:06,750 --> 00:07:08,500\n但能否在荒兽面前离开\n\n76\n00:07:09,250 --> 00:07:10,500\n就得拼一把了\n\n77\n00:07:25,000 --> 00:07:25,750\n若不想死\n\n78\n00:07:26,000 --> 00:07:27,000\n便不要挣扎\n\n79\n00:07:47,750 --> 00:07:48,250\n主子\n\n80\n00:07:48,500 --> 00:07:49,750\n你没事吧\n\n81\n00:07:51,500 --> 00:07:53,000\n这蛙兽着实厉害\n\n82\n00:07:53,250 --> 00:07:54,250\n锁住的一瞬\n\n83\n00:07:55,000 --> 00:07:56,750\n体内灵力差点被它吸光\n\n84\n00:08:19,750 --> 00:08:22,000\n原来此兽就是雷蛙\n\n85\n00:08:23,000 --> 00:08:24,250\n混元驱兽圈\n\n86\n00:08:24,500 --> 00:08:26,250\n应是定时吸收我体内的灵气\n\n87\n00:08:26,750 --> 00:08:28,500\n维持灵兽的锁定状态\n\n88\n00:08:29,250 --> 00:08:30,750\n以后要提前输送灵力\n\n89\n00:08:31,000 --> 00:08:33,250\n否则一旦打斗中出现这种情况\n\n90\n00:08:33,500 --> 00:08:34,750\n危险至极\n\n91\n00:08:50,500 --> 00:08:52,250\n他俩怎么打起来了\n\n92\n00:08:58,500 --> 00:08:59,250\n够了\n\n93\n00:09:06,250 --> 00:09:07,750\n我要在此调息\n\n94\n00:09:08,750 --> 00:09:10,000\n都不得造次\n\n95\n00:09:30,750 --> 00:09:32,250\n都六天了\n\n96\n00:09:32,250 --> 00:09:34,000\n这两个家伙有完没完\n\n97\n00:09:51,000 --> 00:09:52,000\n完蛋了\n\n98\n00:09:52,000 --> 00:09:53,250\n主子醒醒啊\n\n99\n00:09:53,250 --> 00:09:55,250\n来了个大个的\n\n100\n00:10:07,000 --> 00:10:09,750\n以我的修为恐怕难以制服\n\n101\n00:10:29,500 --> 00:10:31,500\n我们接下来去哪啊\n\n102\n00:10:32,250 --> 00:10:33,500\n域外战场\n\n103\n00:10:38,500 --> 00:10:42,750\n今日是武文国域外战场通道开启之日\n\n104\n00:10:43,500 --> 00:10:46,750\n望我国众精英能抓住此次机会\n\n105\n00:10:47,250 --> 00:10:50,000\n让修为更上一层楼\n\n106\n00:10:50,250 --> 00:10:51,750\n多谢使者大人\n\n107\n00:11:12,500 --> 00:11:13,000\n这\n\n108\n00:11:14,000 --> 00:11:14,750\n这是\n\n109\n00:11:14,750 --> 00:11:15,750\n这么多游魂\n\n110\n00:11:17,250 --> 00:11:18,500\n域外战场崩塌了\n\n111\n00:11:18,750 --> 00:11:19,500\n怎么回事\n\n112\n00:11:22,000 --> 00:11:22,750\n那有人\n\n113\n00:11:22,750 --> 00:11:24,000\n他是怎么进去的\n\n114\n00:11:24,000 --> 00:11:26,250\n那位道友恐怕凶多吉少啊\n\n115\n00:12:01,750 --> 00:12:03,000\n晚辈孙文\n\n116\n00:12:03,250 --> 00:12:06,250\n参见前辈\n\n117\n00:12:08,750 --> 00:12:10,000\n此为何地\n\n118\n00:12:11,500 --> 00:12:12,500\n回前辈\n\n119\n00:12:13,000 --> 00:12:14,250\n是武文国\n\n120\n00:12:25,250 --> 00:12:26,750\n怎么看到此人\n\n121\n00:12:27,000 --> 00:12:29,500\n有种遇到家族老祖宗的感觉\n\n122\n00:12:29,750 --> 00:12:31,000\n太可怕了\n\n123\n00:12:37,500 --> 00:12:38,750\n如今禁幡\n\n124\n00:12:39,000 --> 00:12:40,250\n魔头\n\n125\n00:12:40,750 --> 00:12:42,500\n与上古法器均已备好\n\n126\n00:12:43,250 --> 00:12:44,500\n就连那三把剑鞘\n\n127\n00:12:45,250 --> 00:12:47,000\n都被我以元神祭炼\n\n128\n00:12:48,000 --> 00:12:49,000\n现在\n\n129\n00:12:50,000 --> 00:12:51,250\n只差最后一步\n\n130\n00:13:03,750 --> 00:13:04,500\n好了\n\n131\n00:13:14,500 --> 00:13:15,500\n这些年\n\n132\n00:13:16,000 --> 00:13:18,000\n那三把剑鞘先后开始祭炼\n\n133\n00:13:19,250 --> 00:13:21,250\n就连当年上古修士的法宝\n\n134\n00:13:21,750 --> 00:13:23,750\n也破开了为我所用\n\n135\n00:13:24,500 --> 00:13:27,000\n可唯独在修魔海内得到的此物\n\n136\n00:13:27,500 --> 00:13:28,750\n我一直看不透\n\n137\n00:13:49,250 --> 00:13:50,250\n这一天\n\n138\n00:13:50,250 -->
